markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Ragadahn (The Water Lord)](/Deities.aspx?ID=99)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 126 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

As boastful as he is bestial, Ragadahn the Water Lord is the Eldest of oceans, linnorms, and sinuous spirals. He appears as a great serpentine dragon in the First World’s seas, but he is widely traveled and takes other forms as needed to pursue both martial conquests and amorous affairs. He is widely believed to be the progenitor of all linnorms, and he claims to be the progenitor of all dragons. True dragons stridently contest this assertion, although they wisely decline to do so when in Ragadahn’s majestic presence. Failure to deliver proper respect to the arrogant Ragadahn invites his legendary ire, and no supplicant can ever be too flattering for his tastes. Yet for all his tempestuous nature, he is wise, and he holds much otherwise lost and forgotten knowledge.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Eldest
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=7)

**Edicts** Draw spirals, seek primordial secrets, use poison, always carry water

**Anathema** Suffer a linnorm’s death curse, destroy a fossil

**Area of Concern**
oceans, linnorms, and sinuous spirals

**Follower Alignments**
NE, CN, CE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)

**Favored Weapon** [Whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=48)

**Domains** [Destruction](/Domains.aspx?ID=8), [Vigil](/Domains.aspx?ID=55), [Water](/Domains.aspx?ID=35), [Wyrmkin](/Domains.aspx?ID=57)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Hydraulic Push](/Spells.aspx?ID=154)

- **3rd**
[Feet to Fins](/Spells.aspx?ID=113)

- **6th**
[Purple Worm Sting](/Spells.aspx?ID=242)

</column>
name: Ragadahn (The Water Lord)
